languages.text: "О, что за мрачное отчаяние пропитало воздух. Все ваши праздники столь же приятны и сладки на вкус?" {n}Кажется, ксенос не издевается, а по настоящему заинтересован.{/n}
"Mmm, the taste of dark despair in the air. Do all your celebrations taste as sweet as this?" {n}The xenos's question seems sincere rather than mocking — he genuinely wishes to know the answer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О, что за мрачное отчаяние пропитало воздух. Все ваши праздники столь же приятны и сладки на вкус?" {n}Кажется, ксенос не издевается, а по настоящему заинтересован.{/n}

languages.text: “嗯嗯，空气中弥漫着阴暗与绝望的味道。你们所有的庆祝活动，都是像这样甜蜜吗？”{n}玛拉斋的问题听起来并不像是在嘲弄，而是在真诚地发问。他真的很想知道答案。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mmm, the taste of dark despair in the air. Do all your celebrations taste as sweet as this?" {n}The xenos's question seems sincere rather than mocking — he genuinely wishes to know the answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “嗯嗯，空气中弥漫着阴暗与绝望的味道。你们所有的庆祝活动，都是像这样甜蜜吗？”{n}玛拉斋的问题听起来并不像是在嘲弄，而是在真诚地发问。他真的很想知道答案。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ、暗い絶望の味がする。お前の祝杯はどれもこれほど甘いのか？」{n}その異種族の問いかけは、あざ笑うようなものではなく、真摯なものだ。彼は心から、答えを望んでいるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mmm, the taste of dark despair in the air. Do all your celebrations taste as sweet as this?" {n}The xenos's question seems sincere rather than mocking — he genuinely wishes to know the answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ、暗い絶望の味がする。お前の祝杯はどれもこれほど甘いのか？」{n}その異種族の問いかけは、あざ笑うようなものではなく、真摯なものだ。彼は心から、答えを望んでいるのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, el dulce sabor de la desesperación más oscura llena el aire. ¿Son todas vuestras celebraciones igual de apetitosas?». {n}La pregunta del xenos es más sincera que burlona. Siente verdadera curiosidad por la respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mmm, the taste of dark despair in the air. Do all your celebrations taste as sweet as this?" {n}The xenos's question seems sincere rather than mocking — he genuinely wishes to know the answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ah, el dulce sabor de la desesperación más oscura llena el aire. ¿Son todas vuestras celebraciones igual de apetitosas?». {n}La pregunta del xenos es más sincera que burlona. Siente verdadera curiosidad por la respuesta.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Mmm, le doux parfum du désespoir qui flotte dans l'air... Est-ce que toutes vos célébrations sont aussi délicieuses ? » {n}La question du xénos semble sincère, plutôt que moqueuse ; la réponse lui importe vraiment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mmm, the taste of dark despair in the air. Do all your celebrations taste as sweet as this?" {n}The xenos's question seems sincere rather than mocking — he genuinely wishes to know the answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mmm, le doux parfum du désespoir qui flotte dans l'air... Est-ce que toutes vos célébrations sont aussi délicieuses ? » {n}La question du xénos semble sincère, plutôt que moqueuse ; la réponse lui importe vraiment.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Mmm, der Geschmack von dunkler Verzweiflung liegt in der Luft. Schmecken alle Eure Feiern so süß?" {n}Die Frage des Xenos wirkt aufrichtig und ohne Spott – er möchte wirklich eine Antwort bekommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mmm, the taste of dark despair in the air. Do all your celebrations taste as sweet as this?" {n}The xenos's question seems sincere rather than mocking — he genuinely wishes to know the answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mmm, der Geschmack von dunkler Verzweiflung liegt in der Luft. Schmecken alle Eure Feiern so süß?" {n}Die Frage des Xenos wirkt aufrichtig und ohne Spott – er möchte wirklich eine Antwort bekommen.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Havada kara bir umutsuzluk tadı var. Tüm kutlamalarınızın tadı bu kadar güzel midir?" {n}Zenonun dalga geçer gibi değil de samimi bir soru sorar gibi bir hâli var. Gerçekten de yanıtı merak ediyor.{/n}
